evidence_summary: The learner starts an utterance with an incomplete phrase ('if I buy this as a'), then pauses and rephrases their thought process ('yes, I take this out, maybe I think this is better') before formulating a clear question. This is a self-correction of an unclear initial utterance, initiated by the learner and successfully resolved as the question becomes clear.
